n = int(input())

fizz = n//3
buzz = n//5
fizzbuzz = n//15

fizz_sum = (fizz*(fizz+1))//2*3
buzz_sum = (buzz*(buzz+1))//2*5
fizzbuzz_sum = (fizzbuzz*(fizzbuzz+1))//2*15

print(fizz_sum + buzz_sum - fizzbuzz_sum)

def fizzbuzz(n):
    return n if n % 3 != 0 and n % 5 != 0 else (
        'Fizz' if n % 3 == 0 else '') + (
        'Buzz' if n % 5 == 0 else '')


def fizzbuzz_sum(n):
    return sum(i for i in range(1, n + 1) if fizzbuzz(i) != 'FizzBuzz')


print(fizzbuzz_sum(N))
